comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Thisk this is Josephine May Ashton Crosby Forbes (1885-1967), wife of Allan Forbes (1874-1955), mother of five. Josephine and Allan married in 1913. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forbes_family Her youngest son, Henry Ashton Crosby Forbes, an expert on Asian art, died just this year (July 2012): www.legacy.com/obituaries/nhregister/obituary.aspx?pid=15... The family papers seem to be at the Massachusetts Historical Society: www.masshist.org/findingaids/doc.cfm?fa=fa0105

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: New-York tribune., May 12, 1910, Page 7 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1910-05-12/ed-... Has a group picture of ladies taken at the Actors Fund Fair the night before. Miss Josephine M. Crosby could easily be the same woman as in this photo. She clearly thinks this pose shows her to best advantage.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content:
pennyrichardsca and swanq: 

Thanks for your identification of this woman as Josephine May Ashton Crosby wife of  Allan Forbes. We will update the description with more details.
